p.strong: Welcome to the Cyber Security Monitoring App

html.p: This application is designed to support security detection development and threat analysis using curated attack datasets. It serves as a dedicated environment for building, testing, and validating security use cases based on real-world attack techniques.

This app provides a focused workspace for security analysts and detection engineers to develop detection content without the overhead of a full enterprise security platform. While it does not replace comprehensive tools like Splunk Enterprise Security, it offers essential capabilities for security event analysis and use case development.

ul.li: Security Events Monitoring - Real-time visibility into attack data ingested from the Splunk Attack Data repository
Detection Use Cases - MITRE ATTACK-based detections mapped to specific techniques and tactics
Security Reports - Pre-built reports for threat analysis and detection validation
Test Environment - Safe space to develop and refine detection logic before production deployment

html.p: This app will continue to evolve with additional features including correlation searches, threat intelligence integration, automated alerting, and expanded MITRE ATTACK coverage.

This app is intended for security analysts, detection engineers, and SOC teams who are developing and testing security content. Access requires appropriate permissions to security-related indexes and data sources.

p.em: Note: This is a development and testing environment. Some dashboards and searches reference attack datasets specifically ingested for detection engineering purposes.
